pageContext.claim: “We are your largest partner. You're our largest partner. A lot of people don't know that. I was surprised.”
pageContext.analysis: This is wrong. The United States’ top partners so far in 2019 are Mexico, Canada and China, with total trade amounting to $150.6 billion, $146.6 billion and $132 billion. Britain ranked seventh at $33.1 billion. In 2018, top trading partners were China ($659.8 billion), Canada ($617.2 billion) and Mexico ($611.5 billion), and Britain placed seventh ($127 billion).
